titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the School of Organization and Management, Yale University, Records of the Dean
School of Organization and Management, Yale University, Records of the Dean
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:40

did.unittitle: School of Organization and Management, Yale University, records of the dean

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of reports, minutes, schedules, publications, memoranda, and subject files documenting policy, student advising, courses, faculty workload, grading, and committees of the Yale School of Organization and Management.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. School of Organization and Management

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 30-A (YRG 30-A), Central records and records of the dean of the Yale School of Management.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Organization and Management, Yale University, Records of the Dean (RU 348). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of reports, minutes, schedules, publications, memoranda, and subject files documenting policy, student advising, courses, faculty workload, grading, and committees of the Yale School of Organization and Management.
